text: Pus agar Allah Taalaa aap ko inn ki kissi jamat ki taraf lota ker wapis ley aaye phir yeh aap say maidan-e-jang mein nikalney ki ijazat talab keren to aap keh dijiye kay tum meray hergiz chal nahi saktay aur na meray sath tum dushmanon say laraee ker saktay ho. Tum ney pehli martaba hi beth rehney ko pasand kiya tha pus tum peechay reh janey walon mein hi bethay raho
